## Annual Themes
- 2023: Momentum 
- 2024: Presence
- 2025: Elevate

## Content Guidelines

### Tone & Style
- Professional yet approachable and punchy
- Focus on growth and partnership
- Emphasize tangible, worthy solutions
- Use Filipino context when relevant (San Carlos City, Philippines)

### Key Messaging
- Digital solutions that align with business growth
- Partnership-focused approach ("Together with You")
- Quality over quantity ("Better Solutions")
- Efficiency in delivery ("Faster Delivery")

### Repository Structure
- All content should be in Markdown format
- Organize by service areas and business functions
- Include practical, actionable information
- Reference annual themes when appropriate

- Colors: Amber, Black, Gray, White
- Visuals: Use icons/emojis.
- Always emphasize the "outsoar" concept (exceeding expectations)
